name: Dinosaur Survival Saga - Deadly Dino Simulator
name_original: Dinosaur Survival Saga - Deadly Dino Simulator
description:
It's time to play the angry dinosaur simulator and experience time travel. Dinosaur Survival Saga takes you the Jurassic age where dinosaurs rule and attack their prey to feed themselves. The monstrous creature is on a rampage! These terrifying T-Rex dinosaurs are under your command. Experience the simulation of dinosaur running, hunting, attacking by monster strikes on animals when they are in range. This T-Rex survival game is designed for you to take control of a huge dinosaur and make sure it survives by feeding it. There are mini dinosaur-wars amongst T-Rex who are fighting to eat the same prey so make sure you manoeuvre the simulation using the controls.

Take control of a big T-Rex in this dinosaur simulator game and attack the animals for survival in the Jurassic age. The T-Rex needs to run fast and do make sure it reaches near its prey and then attack with a huge strike. The dinosaur may need to attack a lot of animals to survive. The game has smooth controls and is fun to play. It is a big 3D dinosaur which will keep you entertained for a very long time. Explore the natural habitat of dinosaurs and relive the prehistoric era.

Dinosaur Survival Saga features:

+ Realistic simulation of dinosaurs in Jurassic environment
+ Smooth controls for simulation of dinosaur's run and attack
+ 3D environment and graphics taking you back in time
+ Game Center Leaderboard and Achievements
+ Challenging gameplay with T-Rex & other dinosaurs simulation

We hope you enjoy the game. Your comments & ratings are welcome and will help us in creating even better games for you.
